posts.post_title: SOLD: Reduced! T206 Schulte Front View SGC 4 Piedmont 150/25
posts.post_content:

A perfectly centered SGC 4 did north of 800 at REA earlier this month… 

Please DM for quickest response, thanks!

Update 6/11 - card IS available. Make me a reasonable offer? Comps on VCP are skewed because of one very high recent sale at REA. Thanks.
